title: LED Lenser logo font ID
content:
Can anyone please help to ID the LED Lenser logo font? Is it a custom job??

[logo LED Lenser](http://web.archive.org/web/20110415080432/http:/www.ledlenserusa.com/images/logo.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20110415080432im_/http:/typophile.com/files/logo-ledco-black_6659.gif)
author: skyrocket

comments.content: This is probably not the answer you want, but it looks like one of those generic sci-fi fonts to me. Since it's the company's logotype it's probably a custom job. You can probably find an equivalent on the numerous "Free Fonts"-sites.
Thanks Northbay. Yes, the closest I can find on dafont for example is a free typeface called Radio Space.
